message: https://t.co/w5MdVA7B0e very good read about linkedin's kafka and how it manifests in distributed systems.
story: Khaled Gomaa shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: The Log: What every software engineer should know about real-time data's unifying abstraction
caption: engineering.linkedin.com
description: I joined LinkedIn about six years ago at a particularly interesting time. We were just beginning to run up against the limits of our monolithic, centralized database and needed to start the transition to a portfolio of specialized distributed systems.
